required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Palliative Care Needs Assessment of the Population Living in Mayotte (French Island of Comoros)
clinical_study.official_title: What Are the Palliative Care Needs of the Mahoran Population Take Into Consideration the Socio-anthropological Specificities of This Population, But Also the Demographic, Social, Health and Geographical Characteristics of Mayotte Island

brief_summary.textblock:
This qualitative study aims to explore the assessment of palliative care needs of the population living in Mayotte, French territory of the Comoros.
The aim is to offer a palliative care service tailored to the needs of the population in this area.

primary_outcome.description: individual semi-structured interviews to obtain a aata saturation Reliability and Validity of the research described according to Guba.

intervention.description: Interview bases on the use of an interview guide, during one hour maximum

study_pop.textblock:
3 studies will be conducted: one with "palliative patients" identified by their care workers, one with their family or caregivers, and one with their care workers.
.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients study: to be at the palliative stage of his illness, informed consent
- family study: being a family or caregiver of a patient in palliative care, informed consent
- care workers study: being a care worker of a patient in palliative care, informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- 0
